metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35738 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
WavPack 5.3.0 has an out-of-bounds write in WavpackPackSamples in pack_utils.c because of an integer overflow in a malloc argument. NOTE: some third-parties claim that there are later "unofficial" releases through 5.3.2, which are also affected.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35738` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwavpack1 - 5.2.0-1ubuntu0.1
wavpack - 5.2.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wavpack package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.2.0-1ubuntu0.1').
